DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : BANKING & FINANCE
DOC.TEXT: Chase Manhattan to Enter Securities Trade : The New York bank said it has federal permission to begin underwriting and trading_in corporate securities.Such approval represents an important step for commercial_banks away from restrictions -- dating_back to the 1930s -- on the involvement by banks in securities-related activities . Chase , Citicorp and a_few other banks have applied for and received permission to underwrite corporate debt securities through separately capitalized subsidiaries . They may issue debt in the form of securities for public and private companies . Some other banks , including J.P. Morgan & Co. , Bankers Trust Co. , Daughin Deposit Corp. , NationsBank and Chemical Banking Corp. , have received approval to underwrite equities .
